title: Part One: The Family That Stole Malaysia
itunes:title: Part One: The Family That Stole Malaysia
description:
Robert is joined by Dr. Kaveh Hoda to discuss the Brooke Family.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://www.thedailybeast.com/the-british-family-that-ruled-in-borneo-as-white-rajahs
  2. http://content.time.com/time/subscriber/article/0,33009,763444-2,00.html
  3. http://factsanddetails.com/southeast-asia/Malaysia/sub5_4a/entry-3617.html
  4. https://www.thedailybeast.com/the-british-family-that-ruled-in-borneo-as-white-rajahs
  5. https://www.jstor.org/stable/41493196?read-now=1&refreqid=excelsior%3Ad655695ae199b5bb8bb97150d8e70f8b&seq=9#page_scan_tab_contents
  6. https://www.nst.com.my/opinion/columnists/2020/12/652051/revisiting-sarawaks-brooke-era
  7. https://www.brooketrust.org/history-of-sarawak
  8. https://www.nytimes.com/1986/07/13/travel/sarawak-a-kingdom-in-the-jungle.html
  9. http://unsworks.unsw.edu.au/fapi/datastream/unsworks:60180/SOURCE02?view=true
  10. https://journals.openedition.org/moussons/2642?lang=en
  11. Payne, Robert. The White Rajahs of Sarawak (pp. 25-26). Lume Books. Kindle Edition
  12. Barley, Nigel. White Rajah . Little, Brown Book Group. Kindle Edition.
